name: my Carbelouz!
description:
Introducing My Carbelouz - the ultimate survival game set in the coastal town of Annaba, Algeria, in the year 2007. Get ready to experience the thrill of street racing, the challenge of running a business, and the delicious taste of kalbellouz! In this game, you'll take on the role of a skilled driver and entrepreneur. Use your racing skills to win races and earn money, and invest in your kalbellouz business to expand your empire. Sell your mouth-watering kalbellouz to the locals and become the most successful food vendor in town.

But watch out! The competition is fierce, and danger is always lurking around the corner. Take on rival racers and protect your business from potential threats. Make strategic decisions, build alliances, and write your own story in the vibrant town of Annaba.

Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure that will test your skills and your taste buds. Only the most daring and savvy players will succeed in My Carbelouz. Will you be one of them?

Thank you for your interest in My Carbelouz! As an indie developer working solo, I'm dedicated to creating a game that offers a unique and exciting experience for players. My Carbelouz is currently in beta development stage, with approximately 90% of features and content still in progress.

I'm passionate about bringing this game to life, but I can't do it without your help. By donating to my project, you can help fund the development of My Carbelouz and bring it to its full potential. Your donations will go towards hiring more developers, creating new game features, and improving the overall quality of the game.

I understand that it can be challenging to trust an indie developer working solo, but I'm committed to being transparent about my progress and keeping you updated every step of the way. My Carbelouz is a labor of love, and I'm dedicated to creating a game that players will love.

If you appreciate my vision and want to support an indie developer working solo, please consider donating to my project. Your support means the world to me, and it will help me bring My Carbelouz to life. ❤️
